name: Bullet Pong
description:
This game is the first game that I've people have told me that they enjoy playing, I finished it in 3 days. The third day was just messing about with the AI. It was made with Game Maker: Studio.

Controls: This game is either local multiplayer or versus an AI. For local multiplayer the controls are W and S for moving player 1 (the left paddle) and D for them to shoot. Then the controls are the up and down arrows to move player 2, and the left arrow to shoot. Against the AI you will have to play as player 1 and use W, S, and D to control your paddle.

Have fun and please send feedback. 💕
